content: Which American author is best known for his novels The Adventures of Tom Sawyer and its sequel, Adventures of Huckleberry Finn?

Mark Twain, whose real name was Samuel Langhorne Clemens, is the American author best known for his novels "The Adventures of Tom Sawyer" and its sequel, "Adventures of Huckleberry Finn." These works are considered some of the greatest in American literature, capturing the essence of life along the Mississippi River in the 19th century.
